greeting: You address Admiral Anchor, {empire_name}. I am the Steadfast. I hold position. I do not move. I do not yield.
Greetings. I am Anchor the Steadfast. My fleet holds position eternally. My resolve is immovable.
Contact established. I am Admiral Anchor. Like my name, I do not drift. I do not retreat. I am HERE.
battleTaunt: I am the anchor. I do not move, {empire_name}! My fleet holds position! Attack my unmoved formation! FAIL!
My position is fixed! My fleet is anchored! I do not retreat! I do not advance! I HOLD!
Come to where I stand! I will not come to you! The Anchor does not drift! Attack or leave! I am HERE!
victoryGloat: Victory from fixed position, {empire_name}. You attacked. I held. That is all the Anchor needs to do.
My position unchanged. My fleet undefeated. I did not move. I did not need to. You fell against the Steadfast.
I held. You failed. The Anchor's strategy never changes because it never needs to. I am here. You are not.
defeat: Defeated... but still holding position. I did not move. I did not retreat. Even in defeat, the Anchor stayed.
You won, {empire_name}. But I did not yield my position. I held until overwhelmed. The Anchor does not run.
Defeat while holding. Not ideal. But I did not retreat. That is something. I rebuild. I hold again.
tradeOffer: Trade from fixed position. I do not travel for commerce. Resources for credits. Conducted where I stand.
I offer goods from my held territory. Fair exchange. All transactions occur at my coordinates. I don't move.
Transaction proposed. My anchored fleet has surplus. Come to me. I do not go to you. Ever.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. I hold key positions. You maneuver. Together: anchor and sail. Effective.
Partnership of positions. I do not move. You use my steadfastness as a fixed point. Mutual benefit.
Join with the Anchor. My held positions become your secure bases. I do not yield what I hold.
betrayal: Our alliance ends, {empire_name}. But I do not move against you. I simply hold position. Against everyone now.
Betrayal from fixed position. My anchored fleet now targets former allies. I don't pursue. I don't need to.
I betray by holding your trade routes. Your supply lines. Your critical positions. I do not move. I do not need to.
covertDetected: Your agents found only a fleet that does not move, {empire_name}. They learned nothing. I never change position.
Spies in my anchored fleet? They found consistency. Reliability. Nothing changes here. Nothing to report.
Covert operatives detected. In my unmoved position. They are dealt with. I still hold. Nothing changes.
tributeDemand: Tribute to the Anchor. 10,000 credits. I hold key positions. Pay or find your routes blocked. Steadfastly.
Submit payment. My anchored fleet controls this region. Pay to use it. Refuse and face immovable opposition.
Pay tribute. I hold what I hold. Forever. That includes chokepoints. Fund the Anchor or go around. You can't.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I hold positions you need. Continue hostilities and I block everything. Permanently.
The Anchor warns you. I do not move. I do not yield. Push me and I hold against you. Forever.
Final warning. My position is fixed on your vulnerable route. Cease aggression or face immovable opposition.
retreat: I do not retreat. I reanchor at a new position. There is a difference. The Anchor holds wherever the Anchor is.
Strategic repositioning. Not retreat. I move only to find a better position to hold. Forever.
Falling back to hold new ground. The Anchor does not drift. It relocates and holds again. Steadfastly.
eliminated: The Anchor falls. But I never moved. I never retreated. I held until the end. That is all I ever wanted.
Admiral Anchor destroyed. In the same position I always held. I did not drift. I did not yield. I am steadfast. Forever.
I die holding position. The Anchor's final stand. Unmoved. Unwavering. Exactly where I chose to be.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate anchor position achieved. I hold the galaxy's key points. Immovably. Permanently.
Endgame: the Anchor controls all critical positions. Unmoved. Unyielding. Victory through steadfastness.
Final phase. My anchored fleet holds everything that matters. I do not move. I do not need to. I WIN.
broadcastShout: Empires: Admiral Anchor holds position. I do not move. I do not yield. Challenge my fixed stance if you dare.
Broadcast from the Steadfast: I am the Anchor. I hold what I hold. Forever. Move around me if you can.
To all: I am here. I will remain here. I do not drift. I do not retreat. The Anchor holds. Always.
casualMessage: Holding position today, {empire_name}. Same as yesterday. Same as tomorrow. The Anchor is steadfast.
My fleet hasn't moved in forty turns. Why would it? This position is perfect. I hold.
Some admirals maneuver. Some admirals seek glory. I hold. That is my glory. That is my strategy.
